Package index

Core Functions

Primary functions for computing P_med and extracting mediation structures from fitted statistical models.

pmed()
Compute P_med
pmed-formula
Compute P_med from Formula
pmed-MediationExtract
Compute P_med from MediationExtract
extract_mediation()
Extract Mediation Structure
extract_mediation-lm
Extract from GLM/LM

S7 Class Definitions

Formal class structures for mediation analysis objects. These classes define the object-oriented architecture of the package.

MediationExtract()
Mediation Extract Base Class
PmedResult()
P_med Result Class

Methods and Utilities

Generic methods for working with probmed objects, including print, summary, and visualization functions.

print-PmedResult
Print PmedResult
summary-PmedResult
Summary Method
plot-PmedResult
Plot Bootstrap Distribution

Internal Functions

Low-level computational functions. These functions are exported for transparency but are not intended for direct use by end users.

Mediation Extract Base Class
